form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: U.S. Department of Homeland Security Citizenship and Immigration Services, FOIA (b(6)

full_text: Screened by NARA, 6/15/2023 DEPARTMENT U.S. OF U.S. Department of Homeland Security HOMELAND SECURITY Citizenship and Immigration Services 9650 Flair Drive El Monte, CA 91731 Date: HOV 02 2004 File: A46 040 013 I, CaSIMIRA Escobar , do hereby authorize the following named individual. who has identified him/herself to me as MARIA A. IRAHETA of the following address FOIA (b)(6) , to act as my interpreter during my interview for naturalization. I fully understand that by requesting the above named individual to act as an interpreter between me and the Immigration Service, I may be breaching the confidentiality of this interview. The above named individual has assured me that he/she will act in good faith and has the ability to speak and understand both English and Espanish . .I hereby relieve the immigration Service of any responsibility associated with the translation of my interview. Cacimiun Kescolar Signature of Applicant I, FOIA (b)(6) have acted as an interpreter in the above case. I am fluent in the Spanish and the English languages. I swear or affirm that my translation of these proceedings is true and correct to the best of my knowledge. FOIA (b)(6) We Alien Registration Number (If Appropriate) FOIA (b)(6) FOIA (b)(6) California(ID) (DL) verephone Number Adjudications DAO Officer W. ALOG.
